data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Simulates an inductor. The ____ exploits ____ fact ____ the ____ flowing ____ a ____ behaves ____ time ____ the ____ across ____ inductor. The capacitor used in this circuit is smaller than the inductor it simulates and its capacitance is less subject to changes in value due to environmental changes.
data.partBlankContent: Simulates an inductor. The cir____ exploits t__ fact th__ the cur____ flowing thr____ a capa_____ behaves thr____ time a_ the vol____ across a_ inductor. The capacitor used in this circuit is smaller than the inductor it simulates and its capacitance is less subject to changes in value due to environmental changes.
data.fullContent: Simulates an inductor. The circuit exploits the fact that the current flowing through a capacitor behaves through time as the voltage across an inductor. The capacitor used in this circuit is smaller than the inductor it simulates and its capacitance is less subject to changes in value due to environmental changes.
data.answer: 模拟一个电感器。该电路利用了这样一个事实:流过电容器的电流在时间上的表现就像流过电感器的电压一样。该电路中使用的电容比它所模拟的电感小，其电容受环境变化值的影响较小。
